about_the_game:
The 2016 Halloween Pack is here!

Get the exclusive Jack O'lantern floating head and use the keys in this pack to collect candy and find Jack O's missing body in the game to go with this great pumpkin head pet and awesome other Halloween stuff!

This package contains items worth 50$
  • 10x Halloween Dungeon Keys
  • 1x Jack O'Lantern (pet skin)
  • 1x Frankensteins Monster Skin
  • 1x Witch Skin
  • 1x Halloween Candy

Items will be delivered to your gift chests in the game after you buy this DLC, wait a few minutes and re-launch the game.

short_description: The 2016 Halloween Pack is here!Get the excluisve "Jack O'Lantern" floating head (pet skin), only available during the halloween season, keys for a special halloween dungeon, two more haunting character skins and your first Halloween Candy!
